title: A Verse to Soothe Your Parent Guilt
itunes:author: Guest: Eryn Lynum
itunes:summary: Parenting is far from perfect, but your mistakes don't have to define you. John and Danny give some tips for how to bring peace to your family. Receive the book 936 Pennies with your gift of any amount!
